FuncDef:
The control-session inactive command configures an inactive interval for a control session on the Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (TWAMP) server.
The undo control-session inactive command cancels the configuration.
By default, the inactive interval of a control session is 900s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an inactive interval for a control session.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 6000, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A control session is established through a TCP connection between the server and control-client.
If a control session stays in the inactive state within the specified inactive interval, the control session is deleted to reduce resource consumption.
